name: Ha Noi - Hoa Lu - Tam Coc Full Day Tour
description: A full day tour to discover Ninh Binh with a boat trip to visit three enormous caves and view local fisher folk and explore the village along the river. Another exciting activity the visit to Hoa Lu, an ancient Capital of Vietnam (968 - 1009) and the temples of the Dinh & Le Dynasty. This trip surely bring you unforgettable travel experience.
